segments.text: Tom ? Oh , it's been a while since we've talked to each other . Nice to hear you again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Same here . Hey , did you know Susan is going to get married . She invited me to her wedding and she wants you to attend also .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . I'm calling to tell you this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She tried , but the line is always busy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I may have stayed on the phone too long . Can you give me her number ? I'll call her later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . So how are things with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty good . I've just bought a new house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In the suburb . How are you and Carol ? Still living in town ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it's really convenient . The theater and Shopping Mall are within walking distance . Well , I got to go . I'll get in touch with you soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Don't forget to call Susan .
segments.speaker: S2
